sense.def:
To puff a cigarette or pipe
ali
to puff at a cigarette or pipe
pomeni kaditi cigareto ali pipo.

seg.quote: He puffed his pipe for several moments.
She raised the cigarette to her lips, intending to take a puff.

sense.def:
To puff
pomeni glasno in hitro dihati, ker nam po napornem delu zmanjkuje sape.

seg.quote: We lugged the branch underneath, panting and puffing.
Her breath came in puffs and gasps.

sense.def:
A puff of air or smoke
je majhna količina zraka ali dima, ki priplava od nekje.

To puff something out
pomeni napolniti nekaj z zrakom, da postane večje in bolj okroglo.

seg.quote: Their chests were puffed out like angry swans.
